thread.title: Impeccable service, great location!!
thread.title_full: Impeccable service, great location!! - Review of The Pierre, A Taj Hotel, New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: J2789KUmaryg
title: Impeccable service, great location!!
text: We stayed during a conference/event at the hotel. The attention to detail and level of service was superior. The hotel staff was very gracious and genuine in ensuring we enjoyed our stay and were also well informed about activities around the city. The location is literally on the corner of Central Park, fantastic!!
